pages.text: Forget about cheesing the Ender Dragon, her fight has been improved and is now more though than ever.$(br2)-She has an anti-flying cheese attack.$(br2)-She no longer can be cheesed with beds/explosions.$(br2)-She summons lightning bolts.

-Breaking crystals can cause some debuffs and mob spawns.$(br2)-Fireballs do some additional explosion damage.$(br2)-Respawns crystals after a time interval.$(br2)-Spawns aggro enderman at players, normal enderman spawn is disabled around.$(br2)-The end is DARK, you will need night vision potions.
